entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening with 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
